alert.note: Alert for Butler; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Butler and central Greenwood Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 722 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Eureka to 5 miles north of El Dorado. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Eureka, Hamilton, Rosalia, Cassoday, Climax, Virgil, Eureka City Lake, El Dorado State Park, Thrall, Eureka Airport, El Dorado Lake and Cross Timbers State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 71 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
